page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content: GATEWAYS SCHOOL IS A PRIVATE DAY SCHOOL FOR GIRLS.THE MAIN BUILDING WAS THE DOWER HOUSE TO THE HAREWOOD ESTATE.IT IS SET IN PLEASANT GROUNDS. THE SCHOOL IS RUN AS A CHRISTIAN FOUNDATION BUT WELCOMES PUPILS OF ALL FAITHS.IT WAS FOUNDED IN 1941.THE HEADMISTRESS IS MISS L.M.BROWN B.A.IN 1985 THERE ARE 32 STAFF.PUPILS ARE ENCOURAGED TO VALUE HIGH STANDARDS IN WHATEVER THEY ARE DOING AND TO WORK HARD TO ACHIEVE THEIR FULL POTENTIAL. CLASSES ARE SMALL. THE PREPARATORY DEPARTMENT(4-11)IS HOUSED IN TWO SEPARATE BUILDINGS.THE HIGH SCHOOL IS HOUSED IN THE ORIGINAL MAIN BUILDING AND IN ADDITIONAL CLASSROOM BLOCKS. THERE ARE COURSES LEADING TO G.C.E. O,AO,A LEVEL AND C.S.E.AFTER 1986 COURSES WILL BE OFFERED FOR G.C.S.E.
